> [xlk](#comment_2_1PA19ZVGt9k6GEX2mYAF6w5zJCPYKWaJEp):  Seriously the safest place you'll ever go. No melon munchers nor bean biters. I love it here, but that's just my experience. Some people come and don't care for it.

There are numerous ways of getting in trouble in China.  A lot of people resent westeners a hatred which is fed by almost every movie that the government produces.

In the nightclub scene a lot of Chinese hate westeners for taking the prettiest women.  They'll approach you offer to buy you drinks and when you are quite drunk, then they'll kick the shit out of you.

Then there is the government and the police themselves.  They're behind most of the crimes.  If you displease somebody in government, for any reason, they can make life very hard for you.  The authorities themselves will vandalize your property, kill your pet, etc.  The Communist system has no feedback mechanism so there is no where to complain.

If you want to communicate with others, all communications are heavily monitored by state agencies.  If you go to church and make friends there, the government will be deciding who you are allowed to be friends with and what you can talk about.  If they don't like who you are talking to they'll block all telephone or chat communication.

China is not a good place.  If you stay there long enough, you'll realize that.

> [theosis](#comment_39_149W17bFN1NbQou6iE81Uq2b8wEvyqwUV1): 60 gigabytes is a lot more disk space than most of the people running ZeroNet peers want to contribute.

It seems a lot of people are running 0net on their cellular phones.  But if you are running it on a desktop 60GB is not a big deal.  Nowadays a 2TB hard disk is about $54, which means 60GB is less than $2 worth of storage.

1565204231_1AM6ZY48ErJLzU89E7wPVjxoqyWuF.body:
Not all the bad things that happen are punishment from God.  Jesus wasn't being punished by God when he died on the Cross.  Joseph wasn't being punished when he was sold by his brothers as a slave to the Ishmaelites.  John the Baptist wasn't being punished when his head was severed.  There are many, many examples of people suffering in the Bible who were NOT BEING PUNISHED.

What happens to you could be a punishment from God, if so remember that God only punishes those that he cares about (there's a Bible quotation for that).
